Home > external > metacyc > getMetsFromMetaCyc.m

getMetsFromMetaCyc

PURPOSE

getMetsFromMetaCyc

SYNOPSIS

function metaCycMets=getMetsFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

DESCRIPTION 

 getMetsFromMetaCyc
   Retrieves information of all metabolites in MetaCyc database

   Input:
   metacycPath  if metacycMets.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory,
                this function will attempt to build it by reading info from
                a local dump of MetaCyc database, and metacycPath is the path
                to the MetaCyc data files

   Output:
   model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
                fields are filled
                id:             'MetaCyc'
                name:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
                mets:           MetaCyc compound ids
                metNames:       Compound name. Reuse compound id here if
                                there is no name provided
                metFormulas:    The chemical composition of the metabolite.
                inchis:         InChI string for the metabolite
                metCharges:     Compound charge state
                metMiriams:     If there is a CHEBI id available, then that
                                will be saved here
                keggid:         The corresponding KEGG compound id if available
                version:        MetaCyc database version

   If the file metaCycMets.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
   it will be directly loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing
   the MetaCyc database files. In general, this metaCycMets.mat file should
   be removed and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.
               
   Usage: model=getMetsFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • getMetaCycModelForOrganism getMetaCycModelForOrganism
  • getModelFromMetaCyc getModelFromMetaCyc

0001 function metaCycMets=getMetsFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)
0002 % getMetsFromMetaCyc
0003 %   Retrieves information of all metabolites in MetaCyc database
0004 %
0005 %   Input:
0006 %   metacycPath  if metacycMets.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory,
0007 %                this function will attempt to build it by reading info from
0008 %                a local dump of MetaCyc database, and metacycPath is the path
0009 %                to the MetaCyc data files
0010 %
0011 %   Output:
0012 %   model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
0013 %                fields are filled
0014 %                id:             'MetaCyc'
0015 %                name:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
0016 %                mets:           MetaCyc compound ids
0017 %                metNames:       Compound name. Reuse compound id here if
0018 %                                there is no name provided
0019 %                metFormulas:    The chemical composition of the metabolite.
0020 %                inchis:         InChI string for the metabolite
0021 %                metCharges:     Compound charge state
0022 %                metMiriams:     If there is a CHEBI id available, then that
0023 %                                will be saved here
0024 %                keggid:         The corresponding KEGG compound id if available
0025 %                version:        MetaCyc database version
0026 %
0027 %   If the file metaCycMets.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
0028 %   it will be directly loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing
0029 %   the MetaCyc database files. In general, this metaCycMets.mat file should
0030 %   be removed and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.
0031 %
0032 %   Usage: model=getMetsFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)
0033 
0034 % NOTE: This is how one entry looks in the file
0035 
0036 % //
0037 % UNIQUE-ID - CPD-18846
0038 % TYPES - CPD-18866
0039 % COMMON-NAME - 12-ethyl-8-propyl-bacteriochlorophyllide <i>d</i>
0040 % ATOM-CHARGES - (43 -1)
0041 % ATOM-CHARGES - (12 -1)
0042 % CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (C 35)
0043 % CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (H 36)
0044 % CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (N 4)
0045 % CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (O 4)
0046 % CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (MG 1)
0047 % CITATIONS - 26331578
0048 % CITATIONS - 2350541
0049 % CREDITS - SRI
0050 % CREDITS - caspi
0051 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT - 600.999
0052 % MONOISOTOPIC-MW - 602.274347629
0053 % NON-STANDARD-INCHI - InChI=1S/C35H39N4O4.Mg/c1-7-9-21-16(3)24-14-29-32(19(6)40)18(5)26(37-29)13-25-17(4)22(10-11-31(42)43)34(38-25)23-12-30(41)33-20(8-2)27(39-35(23)33)15-28(21)36-24;/h12-15,17,19,22,40H,7-11H2,1-6H3,(H3,36,37,38,39,41,42,43);/q-1;+2/p-3/t17-,19?,22-;/m0./s1
0054 % SMILES - CCCC5(=C(C)C9(N6([Mg]27(N1(C(C(C)C(CCC(=O)[O-])C=1C4([C-]C(=O)C3(=C(CC)C(N2C3=4)=CC5=6)))=CC8(=C(C)C(C(O)C)=C(N78)C=9))))))
0055 
0056 % A line that contains only '//' separates each object.
0057 
0058 % Check if the metabolites have been parsed before and saved. If so, load
0059 % the model.
0060 ravenPath=findRAVENroot();
0061 metsFile=fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','metaCycMets.mat');
0062 metaCycMetFile='compounds.dat';
0063 
0064 if exist(metsFile, 'file')
0065     fprintf(['Importing MetaCyc metabolites from ' strrep(metsFile,'\','/') '... ']);
0066     load(metsFile);
0067     fprintf('done\n');
0068 else
0069     fprintf(['Cannot locate ' strrep(metsFile,'\','/') '\nNow try to generate it from local MetaCyc data files...\n']);
0070     if ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycMetFile),'file')
0071         EM=fprintf(['The file of metabolites cannot be located, and should be downloaded from MetaCyc.\n']);
0072         dispEM(EM);
0073     else
0074         %Add new functionality in the order specified in models
0075         metaCycMets.id='MetaCyc';
0076         metaCycMets.name='Automatically generated from MetaCyc database';
0077         
0078         %Preallocate memory for 50000 metabolites
0079         metaCycMets.mets=cell(50000,1);
0080         metaCycMets.metNames=cell(50000,1);
0081         metaCycMets.metFormulas=cell(50000,1);
0082         metaCycMets.inchis=cell(50000,1);
0083         metaCycMets.metCharges=zeros(50000,1);
0084         metaCycMets.metMiriams=cell(50000,1);
0085         metaCycMets.keggid=cell(50000,1);
0086         
0087         %First load information on metabolite ID, name, formula, and others
0088         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycMetFile), 'r');
0089         
0090         %Keeps track of how many metabolites that have been added
0091         metCounter=0;
0092         
0093         %Loop through the file
0094         while 1
0095             %Get the next line
0096             tline = fgetl(fid);
0097             %disp(tline);
0098             
0099             % Abort at end of file
0100             if ~ischar(tline)
0101                 break;
0102             end
0103             
0104             % Get the version of MetaCyc database
0105             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'# Version: ')
0106                 metaCycMets.version=tline(12:end);
0107             end
0108 
0109             %Check if it is a new entry
0110             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0111                 metCounter=metCounter+1;
0112                 
0113                 %Add empty strings as initial values
0114                 metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter}='';
0115                 metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter}='';
0116                 metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter}='';
0117                 %metaCycMets.smiles{metCounter}='';
0118                 %metaCycMets.pubchem{metCounter}='';
0119                 metaCycMets.keggid{metCounter}='';
0120                 nonStandardInchis = '';
0121                 
0122                 %Add compound ID
0123                 metaCycMets.mets{metCounter}=tline(13:end);
0124             end
0125             
0126             
0127             %Add name
0128             if numel(tline)>14 &&    strcmp(tline(1:14),'COMMON-NAME - ')
0129                 metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter}=tline(15:end);
0130                 
0131                 %Romve HTML symbols
0132                 metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter}=regexprep(metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter},'<(\w+)>','');
0133                 metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter}=regexprep(metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter},'</(\w+)>','');
0134                 metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter}=regexprep(metaCycMets.metNames{metCounter},'[&;]','');
0135             end
0136             
0137             %Add charge
0138             if numel(tline)>16 &&    strcmp(tline(1:16),'ATOM-CHARGES - (')
0139                 atomCharge=tline(17:end-1);
0140                 
0141                 s=strfind(atomCharge,' ');
0142                 if any(s)
0143                     atomCharge=atomCharge(s+1:end);
0144                     metaCycMets.metCharges(metCounter,1)=metaCycMets.metCharges(metCounter,1)+str2num(atomCharge);
0145                 end
0146             end
0147             
0148             %Add inchis
0149             if numel(tline)>14 && strcmp(tline(1:14),'INCHI - InChI=')
0150                 metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter}=tline(15:end);
0151             end
0152             
0153             %Add non-standard inchis
0154             if numel(tline)>27 && strcmp(tline(1:27),'NON-STANDARD-INCHI - InChI=')
0155                 nonStandardInchis=tline(28:end);
0156             end
0157             
0158             %Add SMILES
0159             if numel(tline)>9 && strcmp(tline(1:9),'SMILES - ')
0160                 
0161                 if isstruct(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter})
0162                     addToIndex=numel(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}.name)+1;
0163                 else
0164                     addToIndex=1;
0165                 end
0166                 tempStruct=metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter};
0167                 tempStruct.name{addToIndex,1}='SMILES';
0168                 tempStruct.value{addToIndex,1}=tline(10:end);
0169                 metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}=tempStruct;
0170             end
0171             
0172             %Add formula
0173             if numel(tline)>20 && strcmp(tline(1:20),'CHEMICAL-FORMULA - (')
0174                 metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter}=strcat(metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter},tline(21:end-1));
0175                 metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter}(isspace(metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter})) = [];
0176             end
0177             
0178             %Add KEGG id
0179             if numel(tline)>23 && strcmp(tline(1:23),'DBLINKS - (LIGAND-CPD "')
0180                 keggid=tline(24:end);
0181                 
0182                 s=strfind(keggid,'"');
0183                 if any(s)
0184                     keggid=keggid(1:s-1);
0185                 end
0186                 
0187                 metaCycMets.keggid{metCounter}=keggid;
0188             end
0189             
0190             %Add CHEBI id
0191             if numel(tline)>18 && strcmp(tline(1:18),'DBLINKS - (CHEBI "')
0192                 chebiID=tline(20:end); %This is because there is sometimes more than one CHEBI index
0193                 
0194                 s=strfind(chebiID,'"');
0195                 if any(s)
0196                     chebiID=chebiID(1:s-1);
0197                 end
0198                 
0199                 if isstruct(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter})
0200                     addToIndex=numel(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}.name)+1;
0201                 else
0202                     addToIndex=1;
0203                 end
0204                 tempStruct=metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter};
0205                 tempStruct.name{addToIndex,1}='chebi';
0206                 tempStruct.value{addToIndex,1}=strcat('CHEBI:',chebiID);
0207                 metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}=tempStruct;
0208             end
0209             
0210             %Add PubChem
0211             if numel(tline)>20 && strcmp(tline(1:20),'DBLINKS - (PUBCHEM "')
0212                 pubchemID=tline(21:end);
0213                 
0214                 s=strfind(pubchemID,'"');
0215                 if any(s)
0216                     pubchemID=pubchemID(1:s-1);
0217                 end
0218                 
0219                 if isstruct(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter})
0220                     addToIndex=numel(metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}.name)+1;
0221                 else
0222                     addToIndex=1;
0223                 end
0224                 tempStruct=metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter};
0225                 tempStruct.name{addToIndex,1}='pubchem.compound';
0226                 tempStruct.value{addToIndex,1}=pubchemID;
0227                 metaCycMets.metMiriams{metCounter}=tempStruct;
0228             end
0229             
0230             %Add non-standard inchis when standard one is unavailable
0231             if strcmp(tline,'//') && strcmp(metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter},'')
0232                 metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter}=nonStandardInchis;
0233                 nonStandardInchis = '';
0234                 
0235                 %Refine formula from inchis
0236                 s=strfind(metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter},'/');
0237                 if any(s)
0238                     inchiFormula=metaCycMets.inchis{metCounter}(s(1)+1:s(2)-1);
0239                     
0240                     %And remove dot characters
0241                     inchiFormula(regexp(inchiFormula,'[.]'))=[];
0242                     if ~strcmp(metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter},inchiFormula)
0243                         metaCycMets.metFormulas{metCounter}=inchiFormula;
0244                     end
0245                 end
0246                 
0247             end
0248             
0249         end
0250         
0251         %Close the file
0252         fclose(fid);
0253         
0254         %If too much space was allocated, shrink the model
0255         metaCycMets.mets=metaCycMets.mets(1:metCounter);
0256         metaCycMets.metNames=metaCycMets.metNames(1:metCounter);
0257         metaCycMets.metFormulas=metaCycMets.metFormulas(1:metCounter);
0258         metaCycMets.metMiriams=metaCycMets.metMiriams(1:metCounter);
0259         metaCycMets.inchis=metaCycMets.inchis(1:metCounter);
0260         metaCycMets.metCharges=metaCycMets.metCharges(1:metCounter,:);
0261         %metaCycMets.smiles=metaCycMets.smiles(1:metCounter);
0262         %metaCycMets.pubchem=metaCycMets.pubchem(1:metCounter);
0263         metaCycMets.keggid=metaCycMets.keggid(1:metCounter);
0264         
0265         %If the metMiriams structure is empty, use MetaCyc id as metMiriams
0266         for i=1:numel(metaCycMets.mets)
0267             if ~isstruct(metaCycMets.metMiriams{i})
0268                 miriamStruct.name{1}='metacyc.compound';
0269                 miriamStruct.value{1}=metaCycMets.mets{i};
0270                 metaCycMets.metMiriams{i}=miriamStruct;
0271             end
0272         end
0273         
0274         %Saves the model
0275         save(metsFile,'metaCycMets');
0276         fprintf(['New metaCycMets.mat has been successfully updated!\n\n']);
0277     end
0278 end
0279 end
